name: Tunnel Vision (Release)
description:
Tunnel Vision is a mystery/puzzle game set in a recently abandoned subway station that the player has found. Throughout the environment, the player will collect pieces of paper located throughout the subway that will show them how to get the subway running in order to ride the subway and locate the secret Underground base.

Credits:

Rachel Barner: 2D/Texture Artist, Programmer

Chris Bruns: Programmer, Game Design

Sydney Lemmon: Project Manager

Maggie Lloyd: 3D Artist

Thomas Winston: Game Designer
